Name: Lollo Campaign II
Description: You have a new "Lollo Fixit" order. Please fulfill it in time.
QuestDesc: You have a new "Lollo Fixit" order. Please fulfill it in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A new business that suits just your capability: "Lollo Fixit."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I heard you fixed a lot of puzzles in the wild alone, including even those left by CSC. You should find no problem doing this job.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One of the worst nightmares during travels is the sudden breakdown of devices. For example, courier truck failures, short circuits of electric locks on courier boxes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What would you do as an experienced repairperson to address these issues?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha, in that case, I can make an expert myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji's Terminal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ding! You have a new repair order. Please fulfill the order in time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A new order! An automatic courier truck went missing in the depths of Whining Aix's Mire. I'll send you the coordinates.

Dialogues.Speaker: Broken-down Cargo Truck
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Impact detected, impact detected. Ejecting copilot in 3141.5926 seconds...

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Repaired, the courier truck shakily makes its way to Port Gunchao.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're here just in time. The cargo truck made it to Port Gunchao in one piece, but it broke down completely shortly afterwards.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's your pay for today. You keep that momentum rolling for tomorrow, all right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here you are. The truck has successfully arrived at Port Gunchao, though not long after it broke down completely.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is your pay today. I will welcome you tomorrow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, right, a coworker at Port Gunchao reported that something was missing in the truck.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maji
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The copilot's missing. You got any idea?
